taskName1: Find the right word to the given picture. You can listen to the sound by pressing the “Play” button. Be attentive, you can make only 1 mistake in each task
taskName2: Find the sound that corresponds to the highlighted letters in the given word. You can listen to the sound by pressing the “Play” button. Be attentive, you can make only 1 mistake in each task
taskName3: Find the word that contains the given sound. You can listen to the sound by pressing the “Play” button. Be attentive, you can make only 1 mistake in each task
